name: CH - AI Effects
description: A deep dive in the NVIDIA effects for Camera Hub.
author: Esteban Aragon

questions.title: What OS is the customer using?

destination.notes: The effects are only available for Windows.

questions.title: Does the customer have a compatible NVIDIA GPU?
questions.notes: To know if that is the case, follow the guide: [Is the NVIDIA GPU compatible?](https://elgato.atlassian.net/wiki/x/AQD8xQ)

destination.notes: Unless a compatible GPU is connected, this will not work :(
